an10.11:1: "Bhikkhus, when a bhikkhu who possesses five factors resorts to and uses a lodging that possesses five factors, in no long time, with the destruction of the taints, he might realize for himself with direct knowledge, in this very life, the taintless liberation of mind, liberation by wisdom, and having entered upon it, dwell in it.
an10.11:2: "And how, bhikkhus, does a bhikkhu possess five factors?
an10.11:3: "And how does a lodging possess five factors?
